lyric:
[00:03.00]Visiting Hours - Ed Sheeran
[00:05.00]作曲：Amy Wadge/Anthony Clemons/Ed Sheeran/Johnny McDaid/Kim Lang Smith/Michael Pollack/Scott Carter
[00:14.36]Produced by：Ed Sheeran/Johnny McDaid 
[00:15.38]I wish that heaven had visiting hours 
[00:21.62]So I could just show up and bring the news 
[00:28.25]That she's getting older 
[00:31.15]I wish that you'd met her 
[00:34.44]Coz the things that she'll learn from me I got them all from you 
[00:41.67]Can I just stay a while and we'll put all the world to rights 
[00:48.11]The little ones will grow and I'll still drink your favourite wine 
[00:54.40]And soon they're going to close but I'll see you another day 
[01:00.18]So much has changed since you been away 
[01:13.12]I wish that heaven had visiting hours 
[01:19.20]So I could just swing by and ask your advice 
[01:25.89]What would you do in my situation 
[01:28.88]I haven't a clue how I'd even raise them 
[01:32.13]What would you do 
[01:35.17]Coz you always do what's right 
[01:39.46]Can we just talk a while until my worries disappear 
[01:45.69]I'd tell you that I'm scared of turning out a failure 
[01:51.33]You'd say remember that the answer in the love that we create 
[01:57.77]So much has changed since you been away 
[02:36.43]I wish that heaven had visiting hours 
[02:42.72]I would ask them if I could take you home 
[02:49.00]But I know what they'd say that it's for the best 
[02:55.19]So I will live life the way you taught me 
[02:58.58]And make it on my own 
[03:02.52]I will close the door but I will open up my heart 
[03:08.86]And everyone I love will know exactly who you are 
[03:15.34]'Cause this is not goodbye it is just until we meet again 
[03:20.98]So much has changed since you been away
